TopicTitle: KSO Shuttle Missions: STS 119 - STS 121 The Duna Discovery Manned Landing and Return

Articles.Content:
The Ninteenth of my STS KSO Shuttle Missions and Fifteenth Flight of the Tenacious! STS 119's objectives are to deploy the Duna Discovery Transfer Probe, with it's nuclear rocket from Kommit Nucleonics, and return to the KSC runway.

Most of the footage is shown in 4x speed for quick viewing, while some is at 8x.

STS 120 Will deploy the manned Duna lander, which will dock with the Duna transfer probe, refuel at KSO Space Station, head off to and finally land on Duna.

The Twentieth of my STS KSO Shuttle Missions and Sixteenth Flight of the Tenacious! STS 120's objective's are to deploy the manned Duna lander, which will dock with the Duna transfer probe, refuel at KSO Space Station, head off to and finally land on Duna!

Most of the footage is shown in 8x speed for quick viewing, while some is at 20x.

STS 121 will show the return of the Duna Discovery to low Kerbin orbit, followed by the launch of KSO Tenacious for a rendezvous and docking before returning to the KSC runway.

The Twenty-First of my STS KSO Shuttle Missions and Seventeenth Flight of the Tenacious! STS 121's objective's are to dock with the returning Duna Discovery Vessel, which is returning from Duna, and return to the KSC Runway to complete the manned Duna mission series!

Most of the footage is shown in 8x speed for quick viewing, while some is at 20x.

STS 122 will be a manned Jool system tour using an adapted KSO Tenacious!
Gotta say you make great use of that shuttle!

Gotta say you make great use of that shuttle!

Thanks! I'm glad you enjoy it!
